abstract: A player’s response to an invitation to join a match.

# GKInviteRecipientResponse

**Enumeration**

A player’s response to an invitation to join a match.

## Declaration

```swift
enum GKInviteRecipientResponse
```

## Responses

- **GKInviteRecipientResponse.accepted**: A response when the player accepts the invitation.
- **GKInviteRecipientResponse.declined**: A response when the player rejects the invitation.
- **GKInviteRecipientResponse.failed**: A response when the system fails to deliver the invitation to the player.
- **GKInviteRecipientResponse.incompatible**: A response when the player isn’t running a compatible version of the game.
- **GKInviteRecipientResponse.unableToConnect**: A response when the system can’t contact the player.
- **GKInviteRecipientResponse.noAnswer**: A response when the invitation times out because the player doesn’t answer it.

## Deprecated Properties

- **inviteeResponseAccepted**: The player accepted the invitation.
- **inviteeResponseDeclined**: The player rejected the invitation.
- **inviteeResponseFailed**: The invitation was unable to be delivered.
- **inviteeResponseIncompatible**: The invitee isn’t running a compatible version of your game.
- **inviteeResponseNoAnswer**: The invitation timed out without an answer.
- **inviteeResponseUnableToConnect**: The invitee couldn’t be contacted.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Inviting players

- **inviteMessage**: The message sent to other players when the local player invites them to join a match.
- **recipients**: The players to invite to the match.
- **recipientResponseHandler**: A method that handles when a player responds to an invitation to join a match.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
